# Pablo Cirre - Developer Portfolio & Projects

## Summary
Personal website of Pablo Cirre, an experienced Web Developer, Big Data Consultant, and Educator based in Granada. Focus on PHP, Python, OpenData, and modern web interfaces.

## Key Sections

### Main
- [Home](https://pablocirre.es/) - Overview of expertise (Big Data, Email Intelligence, Video).
- [About Me](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/About-Me/) - Biography, skills, and background.
- [Projects](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/Projects/) - Showcase of development work.
- [Services](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/Services/) - Professional services offered.
- [Knowledge](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/Knowledge/) - Technical skills and educational content.
- [Experiences](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/Experiences/) - Professional journey.

### OpenData
- [OpenData Main](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/OpenData/) - Access to 1.4M+ business records.
- [Central de Comunicaci√≥n](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/OpenData/centraldecomunicacion/) - Data provider roadmap.
- [Companies Data](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/OpenData/companiesdata/) - European business databases.
- [UK Business](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/OpenData/ukbusiness/) - UK Data sets.

### Tools
- [Tools Index](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/Tools/) - Utility scripts and tools.
- [Kaiju Email Verifier](https://pablocirre.es/paginas/Tools/KaijuEmailVerifier/) - Email verification service.

### Creative Labs (UI/UX)
- [Labs Index](https://pablocirre.es/Labs/) - Interactive web experiments to demonstrate UI/UX skills.
- [Lab 1](https://pablocirre.es/Labs/Lab1/) - Experimental interface.
- [Lab 2](https://pablocirre.es/Labs/Lab2/) - Modern design templates index (Neo-Brutalism, Glassmorphism, etc.).
- [Lab 3](https://pablocirre.es/Labs/Lab3/) - Special creative lab.
